links.title: Ford Patent Envisions Car-to-Car Crypto Transactions - CoinDesk
links.description: A new patent awarded to Ford suggests the U.S. automaker is considering the use of cryptocurrency to let cars on the road communicate with each other and reduce traffic. The patent - "Vehicle-to-vehicle cooperation to marshal traffic" - was published Tuesday and awarded to Ford Global Technologies, LLC.

links.title: Technology Weighs on Stocks as Dollar Jumps - Investments Revolution
links.description: Technology shares slumped again Wednesday as pessimism about the sector showed few signs of letting up. The dollar jumped while Treasury yields held below 2.8 percent as data showed American economic growth beat estimates. The 10-year yield briefly dipped below 2.75 percent for the first time since early February.

links.title: How Microsoft (MSFT) Stock is Bucking the Market Correction - Cabot Wealth Network
links.description: It doesn't get the same press as , isn't a Wall Street darling like Amazon (AMZN) or Netflix (NFLX), and its best days are most certainly behind it. But while the shine may have worn off Microsoft Corp. (MSFT) in the eyes of the general public, MSFT stock remains one of the steadiest performers in the investment world.
